remarks: There is no element between the two arguments of the covers relation. ( ~ cvnbtwn analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)
statement:
cvrfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrfval.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
cvrfval.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrnbtwn $p |- ( ( K e. A /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> -. ( X .< Z /\ Z .< Y ) ) $.
